thread.title: Free Deal of the Week: Office 365: An Introductory Guide
thread.title_full: Free Deal of the Week: Office 365: An Introductory Guide

author: Martin Brinkmann
title: Free Deal of the Week: Office 365: An Introductory Guide
text:
Free Deal of the Week: Office 365: An Introductory Guide By Martin Brinkmann on October 9, 2015 in Deals - Last Update: October 9, 2015 0 
Our free deal of the week brings you an introductory guide to Office 365 that offers the following core information about Microsoft's Office product: What is Office 365. Initial Configuration of Office 365. DNS and UPN Suffixes. Exchange: Client access, Email routing, Federation Services. Lync and Sharepoint setup. Migration and Coexistence. DirSync and Active Directory Federation Services (AD FS) 
This is a quick guide that walks you through key concepts of setting up and configuring Office 365 in a business environment. It focuses on Exchange, SharePoint and Lync and is a good read if you have to deal with those for the first time or want to know more about these services. Click here to visit the Deal's page right now If you have an existing Deals account you can hit the download button right away after signing in. You will receive the download link as an email, and the download itself comes in form of a pdf document that you can open in any pdf reader. If you are a new user you need to create an account first before downloads become available. Make sure you check out the Deals frontpage regularly as it lists new free magazines, ebooks, and technical documents regularly that may be of interest to you. Please share this article About Martin Brinkmann Martin Brinkmann is a journalist from Germany who founded Ghacks Technology News Back in 2005. He is passionate about all things tech and knows the Internet and computers like the back of his hand. You can follow Martin on Facebook , Twitter or Google+
